item.title: Flytipping on pavement Swindon Road, 8th May
item.description:
This is between St Paul’s St North and St Paul’s Lane, unfortunately a regular flytipping location. Current lot is a clear plastic box, cardboard and a bag of rubbish.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55, Swindon Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipping 6 St Paul’s St North, 8th May
item.description:
9 (?) black refuse bags of rubbish on pavement. Rubbish collection is not until next week

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Saint Pauls Street North, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mini roundabout, Parton road, station road…outside Churchdown parish offices…several potholes ongoing, the road painters have painted white lines in the potholes this morning causing traffic to stop in dismay. Raised iron works and rutted surface causing traffic to swerve., 8th May
item.description:
Entrance to Churchdown parish council car park
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Parton Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
